summary: The friends of soccer team Swift Boys 8 now come together only once a year to play a soccer match. As a result, over the years their friendship has become somewhat diluted.
cast: Danny de Munk|Daniël Boissevain|Peter Paul Muller|Thomas Acda|Raymi Sambo|Cas Jansen|Kasper van Kooten|Antonie Kamerling|Kees Boot|Frits Lambrechts|Isa Hoes|Anna Gras|Katja Schuurman|Lucretia van der Vloot|Thor Braun|Salah Edin|Lauretta Gerards|Mark Kleuskens|Sanne Langelaar|Francesc Pagès|Herman Egbers|Bobbie van Roosendaal|Alistair Overeem|Juan Gomez Ocampo|Robbert van den Bergh|Yannick van de Velde|Janna Fassaert|Rick Paul van Mulligen|Jasper Schuringa|Thomas van Montfort|Richard Gonlag|Marijke Pinoy|Jean-Yves Michaud|Sébastien Salvagnac|Mahjoub Benmoussa|Zentveld Gert|Robbert Blokland|Max Davidse|Ron de Groen|Geert Gielissen|Lerrie Grooten|Joshua Tsukasa MacDonald|Anne Rats|Sabine Soetanto|Richard van Hees|Art van Schaaijk
title: All Stars 2: Old Stars
